description: The Bottega Veneta 1012S Sunglasses feature a square masculine Pilot shape with a double metal bridge. The house of Bottega Veneta is known for its impeccable craftmanship and high attention to detail. Providing 100% UV protection from the suns harmful rays these sunglasses are functional in addition to being fashionable.
